snippet: Heavy weapons fire broke out Saturday as Tuareg and Islamist rebels entered Gao, the main city of northeast Mali still under army control, local officials and witnesses said.
abstract: Heavy weapons fire breaks out as Tuareg and Islamist rebels enter Gao, the main city of northeast Mali still under army control.
lead_paragraph: Heavy weapons fire broke out Saturday as Tuareg and Islamist rebels entered Gao, the main city of northeast Mali still under army control, local officials and witnesses said.
